name: Greg and Flower
description:
this is a game where you play as a couple who get trapped in a hotel that turned into a puzzle platformer.

this game is supposed to be multiplayer, but you can control both characters if you have no friends 💀

CONTROLS

you control player 1 with WASD and player 2 with the arrow keys. 

press r to reset and space to continue dialog. 

try not to press too many keys at once because your keyboard might not react.

for player 1, if shift is not responding, press e.

if your screen goes blue you probably pressed Ctrl A. just click somewhere to fix it

also, there's a boss fight at the end.
